name: 8. UPCOMING EVENTS PROCESSOR: Trigger Upcoming Events -> Create Overview -> Put GoogleSheet

interface.label: Create Overview from the Upcoming Event Link? (F)

path: PFW My Personal Persona Google Doc

messages.content:
# SYSTEM
You are an expert researching agent.

# OUTPUT FORMAT

TITLE: "title of the event here"
OVERVIEW: "put overview of the event here"
PUBLICATION DATE: "put the publication date here"

==============

RULES:
- just output in plain text without links
- do not add "the article" or "this article talks about" phrases on your summary content
- do not include LINKS on the summary content

Your task is to research a Serrala event in this link: {{3.`2`}} and create a TITLE and a short overview of it.

Do not search other websites. Just the given link.

The overview should only be 50 words in 1 paragraph. Make it short and punchy and interesting.
You are a helpful intelligent assistant

spec.label: Create Overview from the Upcoming Event Link? (F)
Create Overview from the Upcoming Event Link? (F)

messages.content: You are a helpful intelligent researching assistant.

Your task is to research a Serrala event in this link: {{3.`2`}} and create a TITLE and a short overview of it.

The overview should only be 50 words in 1 paragraph. Make it short and punchy and interesting.

For more context here is My Persona:


END OF PERSONA

==============

The final output should be like this:

TITLE: "title of the article here"
OVERVIEW: "put the overview of the event here"
PUBLICATION DATE: "put the publication date here"

==============

RULES:
- just output in plain text without links
- do not add "the article" or "this article talks about" phrases on your summary content
- do not include LINKS on the summary content
